import React, { Component , useEffect} from 'react'; import img1 from '../assets/bright.gif'; import img2 from '../assets/back.png'; import img4 from '../assets/grey.jpg'; import Navbar from './navbar'; import Slides from './slides'; import img3 from "../assets/cap.png"; import eventIcon from '../assets/eventicon.png'; import users from '../assets/users.png'; import sponsors from '../assets/sponsors.png'; import Aos from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faCoffee, faSearch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; const parallax = document.getElementById('firstparallax'); window.addEventListener('scroll', function(){ let offset = window.pageYOffset; console.log('Offset :'+offset); document.getElementById('firstparallax').style.backgroundPositionY = offset*0.7 + "px"; document.getElementById('aboutus').style.backgroundPositionY = offset*0.7 + "px"; }) const Welcome = () => { useEffect(()=>{ Aos.init({duration:4000}); },[]); return (
